material_metadata.name: Voidstone
material_metadata.narrative: Pitch-black stone that seems to pull light into itself. Radiates subtle wrongness.

material_metadata.name: Light Gem
material_metadata.narrative: Radiant crystal glowing with inner light. Pushes back shadows naturally.

material_metadata.name: Mithril Ingot
material_metadata.narrative: Refined mithril that whispers of ancient secrets. Perfect for weapons that need both power and grace.

material_metadata.name: Living Ichor
material_metadata.narrative: Concentrated essence that remembers being alive. Key ingredient in high-grade potions.

material_metadata.name: Frost Essence
material_metadata.narrative: Frost-blue crystal cold enough to burn. Creates rime patterns on nearby surfaces.
